@dev Gets the funds currently held at the contract address.
@return address(this).balance The balance of the contact.
nodes.name: contractBalance

nodes.documentation: @param _tokenId The NFT to approve
nodes.name: approve

nodes.documentation: @param _approved True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
nodes.name: setApprovalForAll

nodes.documentation: @return The approved address for this NFT, or the zero address if there is none

nodes.documentation: @return True if `_operator` is an approved operator for `_owner`, false otherwise

Redeemed(uint256).details: Checks whether or not a ticket has been redeemed. True indicates the ticket has been redeemed.
Redeemed(uint256).return: ticketRedeemed[_tokenId] the redemption status of the ticket.

addTickets(uint256).details: Adds tickets to the total supply, updating the tickets remaining.

params._amount: The amount of tickets to add.

balanceOf(address).return: The number of NFTs owned by `_owner`, possibly zero

burnTickets(uint256).details: Remove tickets from the totalSupply and update ticketsRemaining.

params._amount: The amount of tickets to remove.

burnTicketsFrom(address,uint256).details: Remove tickets from specified address and update both totalSupply and ticketsRemaining.

contractBalance().details: Gets the funds currently held at the contract address.
contractBalance().return: address(this).balance The balance of the contact.

getApproved(uint256).return: The approved address for this NFT, or the zero address if there is none

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if `_operator` is an approved operator for `_owner`, false otherwise

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of a specific ticket.
ownerOf(uint256).return: ticketOwners[_tokenId] the address of the ticket owner.

purchaseTickets(uint256).details: Purchase tickets from the primary vendor. Tickets are generated at a maximum of 10 per transaction.

purchaseTicketsFrom(address,uint256).details: Purchase tickets from a specified address.

redeemTicket(uint256).details: Redeem a ticket for when entering event

params._tokenId: The id of the ticket to redeem

refundTicket(uint256).details: Refund the owner of a ticket the amount the ticket was originally purchased for.

remainingTickets().details: Returns the number of remaining tickets.
remainingTickets().return: ticketsRemaining The amount of tickets remaining.

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval

ticketForSale(address,uint256,bool).details: Updates the sale status of a ticket.False is notForSale.

params._forSale: The sale status of the ticket

ticketIndexLookup(address,uint256).details: Lookup owner ticket Id's by index

ticketPrice().details: Returns the current price of tickets.
ticketPrice().return: price The price of each ticket.

updateBreakerStatus(bool).details: Updates the status of the circuit breaker.

params._status: The new status of the circuit breaker.

updateTicketPrice(uint256).details: Updates the price of all tickets

params._price: The new price of all tickets

refundTicket(uint256).notice: Tickets can only be refunded if the circuit breaker is active.
